prime_tower_enable.resolve: False if 'BVOH' in extruderValues('material_type') else any(extruderValues('prime_tower_enable'))

retraction_amount_multiplier.label: Retraction Distance Multiplier
retraction_amount_multiplier.description: Multiplier for the length of material retracted during a retraction move. This setting compensates filament compressions in the bowden tube for different bowden types/lengths.

avoid_grinding_filament.label: Prevent Filament Grinding
avoid_grinding_filament.description: When retracting repeatedly, this option moves the hotend to the purge tray and primes the needed amount of filament to allow working on a new piece of it. Disabling this feature can flatten the filament and cause grinding issues.

retraction_count_max_avoid_grinding_fila.label: Maximum Retraction Count
retraction_count_max_avoid_grinding_fila.description: Number of retractions occurring within the retraction distance. When the number of retractions is reached, active extruder will park, prime and come back.

retraction_hop_after_prime_tower.label: Z Hop After Prime Tower
retraction_hop_after_prime_tower.description: After priming in the tower, the build plate is lowered to create clearance between the nozzle and the print. This prevents the nozzle from leaving oozed material on the outside of a print.
retraction_hop_after_prime_tower.enabled: retraction_hop_enabled and machine_extruder_count > 1 and idex_print_mode == 'standard' and prime_tower_enable

hop_at_layer_change.label: Z Hop At Layer Change
hop_at_layer_change.description: Perform a Z Hop when the nozzle is moving to the next layer.

retraction_hop_height_at_layer_change.label: Z Hop Height At Layer Change
retraction_hop_height_at_layer_change.description: Distance to lift Z when the nozzle is moving to the next layer.

clone_cool_fan.label: Clone Print Cooling
clone_cool_fan.description: Enables cooling fan for the idle extruder. This setting allows better temperature control for dual extruder prints.

clone_cool_fan_gcode.label: Clone Print GCode
clone_cool_fan_gcode.description: GCode to enable cooling fan for the idle extruder.
clone_cool_fan_gcode.value: 'M108 P1      ;enable layer fan for the idle extruder' if clone_cool_fan else ''

start_purge_distance.label: Start Purge Distance
start_purge_distance.description: Filament distance purged before extruder starts printing.

start_purge_speed.label: Start Purge Speed
start_purge_speed.description: The speed at which the filament is pushed by the extruder when purging in the purge tray.

idex_print_mode.label: IDEX Print Mode
idex_print_mode.description: The IDEX print mode. You can only set this if just the left nozzle is enabled.

fix_tool_change_travel.label: Fix Tool Change Travel
fix_tool_change_travel.description: Allows the new tool to go straight to the position where it has to print, instead of going to the last position before tool change and then travel to the position where it has to print.

purge_in_bucket.label: Purge At Tool Change
purge_in_bucket.description: Add an extra prime amount in the bucket to compensate oozed material while the Extruder was idle. Disable Prime tower to save time and filament.

purge_distance.label: Purge Distance
purge_distance.description: Filament distance purged at extruder change.
purge_distance.enabled: purge_in_bucket and not smart_purge and idex_print_mode == 'standard'

purge_in_bucket_enable_gcode.label: Purge At Tool Change Enable GCode
purge_in_bucket_enable_gcode.description: GCode to enable Purge At Tool Change commands.
purge_in_bucket_enable_gcode.value: '' if purge_in_bucket and not smart_purge else ';'

smart_purge.label: Use Adaptive Purge Distance
smart_purge.description: Make the purged distance variable according to idle time.

smart_purge_minimum_purge_distance.label: Minimum Purge Distance
smart_purge_minimum_purge_distance.description: Minimum distance to purge when changing toolheads.

smart_purge_maximum_purge_distance.label: Maximum Purge Distance
smart_purge_maximum_purge_distance.description: Maximum distance to purge when changing toolheads.

smart_purge_slope.label: Increase Distance by
smart_purge_slope.description: Distance to purge per minute idle. Purged distance will increase this amount each minute the toolhead remains idle. The real purged distance will never be shorter than the Minimum Purge Distance, or greater than the Maximum Purge Distance.

smart_purge_slope_gcode.label: Distance Gradient
smart_purge_slope_gcode.description: GCode to send proper value to the machine.

smart_purge_enable_gcode.label: Smart Purge Enable GCode
smart_purge_enable_gcode.description: GCode to enable smart purge commands.

prime_tower_closest_to.label: Prime Tower Preferred Position
prime_tower_closest_to.description: Select the preferred area of the buildplate to automatically place the prime tower.

initial_nozzle_temperature.label: Initial nozzle temperature
initial_nozzle_temperature.description: Initial nozzle temperature based on printing temperature and initial layer printing temperature. Used internally.

material_type.label: Material type
material_type.description: Type of material, used internally within BCN3D qualities.

machine_nozzle_type.label: Nozzle type
machine_nozzle_type.description: Type of nozzle, used internally within BCN3D variants.

purge_in_bucket_before_start_gcode.label: Purge in bucket before start GCode
purge_in_bucket_before_start_gcode.description: GCode to purge in bucket each extruder.
purge_in_bucket_before_start_gcode.value:
'
G92 E0 		;zero the extruded length 
G1 E{start_purge_distance} F{start_purge_speed}
G92 E0
G4 S2 		;stabilize hotend 
G1 E-0.5 F1000 
G92 E0
'
